parameters.width: (Self.Width <= 32 & Self.Height <= 32) ? Self.Width : Self.Width * min(32 / Self.Width, 32 / Self.Height)
parameters.height: (Self.Width <= 32 & Self.Height <= 32) ? Self.Height: Self.Height* min(32 / Self.Width, 32 / Self.Height)
